footnotes.english_hilali_khan: (V.104:1) See the footnotes A, B, C, of (V.49:12).

translations.english_saheeh: Woe to every scorner and mocker
translations.english_hilali_khan: Woe to every slanderer and backbiter.[1]
translations.english_rwwad: Woe to every backbiter and slanderer,

footnotes.english_saheeh: [1987]- Rather than spending in the way of Allāh.

translations.english_saheeh: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.[1987]
translations.english_hilali_khan: Who has gathered wealth and counted it.
translations.english_rwwad: who amasses wealth and counts it over and again,

translations.english_saheeh: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal.
translations.english_hilali_khan: He thinks that his wealth will make him last forever!
translations.english_rwwad: thinking that his wealth will make him live forever.

footnotes.english_saheeh: [1988]- i.e., Hellfire, which crushes and destroys all that enters it.

translations.english_saheeh: No! He will surely be thrown into the Crusher.[1988]
translations.english_hilali_khan: Nay! Verily, he will be thrown into the crushing Fire.
translations.english_rwwad: No indeed! He will surely be cast into the Crushing Fire,

translations.english_saheeh: And what can make you know what is the Crusher?
translations.english_hilali_khan: And what will make you know what the crushing Fire is?
translations.english_rwwad: and how do you know what the Crushing Fire is?

translations.english_saheeh: It is the fire of Allāh, [eternally] fueled,
translations.english_rwwad: It is the kindled Fire of Allah,

translations.english_saheeh: Which mounts directed at the hearts.[1989]
translations.english_hilali_khan: Which leaps up over the hearts,

translations.english_saheeh: Indeed, it [i.e., Hellfire] will be closed down upon them
translations.english_hilali_khan: Verily, it shall be closed upon them,
translations.english_rwwad: It will be closed down upon them,

footnotes.english_saheeh: [1990]- Interpreted to be either columns of fire or columns of iron to which are chained the inmates of Hell.

translations.english_hilali_khan: In pillars stretched forth (i.e. they will be punished in the Fire with pillars).
